fields_of_interest: Consumers, Customs, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Transport
eu_initiatives:
Main EU initiatives, policies and legislative files currently followed by GS1 in Europe:  
-    E-invoicing in public procurement / e-procurement  
-    E government action plan 
-    Food information Regulation (Reg 1169/2011)  
-    Fish traceability  
-    General product safety directive 
-    Food safety  
-    Digital Single Market strategy  
-    Parcel Delivery market roadmap
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
position: GS1 in Europe External Relation Manager
goals__remit:
GS1 in Europe objectives are:  
- Leading the creation and implementation of harmonised, user driven solutions for improving the ‘Supply & Demand Chains’ for European users, based on GS1 standards 
- Harmonising the implementation of GS1 standards and solutions across Europe
